means: 聚精会神，热衷，专心致致

sentence.Network_en: Some say suicide is the ultimate act of self - absorption.
sentence.Network_cn: 有人说自杀是 自私自利 的最终后果.

sentence.Network_en: What is the trait you most deplore in yourself? Self - absorption.
sentence.Network_cn: 你最痛悔自己身上什么特质? 全神贯注于自己.

sentence.Network_en: He describes French centralism , single - mindedness and self absorption as the " Cartesian Handicap. "
sentence.Network_cn: 他把法国人的中心主义 、 一门心思和自我关注说成是 “ 笛卡儿式的障碍 ”.
